General.Name: Zhejiang Goldensea Envi Tech C
General.Description: Zhejiang Goldensea Hi-Tech Co., Ltd produces and sells environmental protection filter materials in China and internationally. It offers melt-blown air filter materials, compound air filter materials, melt-blown filter materials for mask, PAF filter materials; PM2.5 air filters, multifunction air filters, cabin filters, aviation cabin filters, and heat recovery ventilation products; general and functional filter mesh; functional filters, HD filters, and pleating filters; single sirocco fans, double sirocco fans, cross-flow fans, turbines, and axial-flow fans; injection parts; air purifiers, and air conditioner and air purifier accessories; disinfectants; and thermometric hand washers. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Goldensea Environment Technology Co.,Ltd. Zhejiang Goldensea Hi-Tech Co., Ltd was founded in 1995 and is based in Shanghai, China.
